title: Our Mutual friend
creator_credit: BBC-TV, Catherine Wearing and Julian Farino
brief_description: Based on Charles Dickens last completed novel, this production paints a sweeping picture of London in the 19th century. With its themes of class war, sexual jealousy and overwhelming passion, it is a tale that is as relevant today as when Dickens first penned it.
